pages.text: Neapolitan brings sweet treats to Minecraft! $(br2)Discover new flavors, ingredients, and desserts, and satisfy your cravings with delicious ice creams, cakes, and milkshakes.
Start by crafting the basic ice cream flavors like Vanilla and Chocolate. $(br2)Harvest vanilla beans, cacao pods, and other ingredients to whip up an assortment of tasty sweets.
Create decadent milkshakes, exotic cakes, and more. $(br2)Each treat comes with unique effects, like Sugar Rush and Speed Boosts, so you can enjoy a delightful snack while adventuring!
